code.title: Code
code.description: Caution: This function will be evaluated in an unprotected context. This means that you will be able to execute almost any JavaScript code.

maxNumOfIterations.title: Maximum number of iterations.
maxNumOfIterations.description: The maximum number of allowed iterations within this function. Defaults to 5,000.

activeLogSampleRate.title: Error log sample rate
activeLogSampleRate.description: A value of 1 (the default) will log every error, a value of 10 will log every tenth error, and so on.

useUniqueLogChannel.title: Use unique log channel
useUniqueLogChannel.description: If enabled, logs from this function will be sent to a unique channel in the form `func:code:${pipelineName}:${functionIndex}. Turn off to use the generic `func:code` log channel instead.
